1.0.name: wordpress/glossyred
1.0.description: The Glossy Red theme for WordPress is stylish, customizable, and simple to use -- make it yours with a custom menu. Glossy Red supports five widgetized areas (one in the sidebar, four in the footer). It includes stylesheets for print and the admin Visual Editor, and has an optional one-column page template that removes the sidebar. Two special widgets for subscribing and displaying the last tweets included.
